name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Cookies (Cookie Dough)
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Cream butter and sugar until light. Add egg and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Shape dough into 1 inch balls, using a heaping tea- spoon of dough for each. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Push one cherry halfway in each ball. When cookies are molded and cherries are pushed in, prepare frosting and use immediately. Frost each cherry by spreading 1⁄2 teaspoon over each cherry. Bake frosted cookies at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes until puffy.
